Description.Text: Hard Rock Panama Megapolis is a stylish 5-star hotel offering chic accommodation near the heart of Panama City. Highlights include a spa and a swimming pool. Panama City is a vibrant cosmopolitan city with a diverse cultural and architectural heritage. Nearby places of interest include Casco Viejo and the Plaza de la Catedral. Local bus services provide fast and easy access to other popular Panama City destinations. The hotel occupies a modern high-rise property. Facilities include an outdoor swimming pool, sauna, whirlpool and gym. A range of massages and spa treatments are available on request. There is also a casino. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the premises. Deluxe rooms are 40sqm and decorated in a bright contemporary style. Some rooms feature a balcony overlooking the ocean. Amenities include a flat-screen satellite TV, mini-bar and work desk. The en-suite bathrooms feature a walk-in shower. The Soy restaurant offers pan-Asian dishes in a sleek and sophisticated setting. The Tauro restaurant offers classic steakhouse dishes with a French twist in a relaxed and intimate setting. Guests can enjoy a range of drinks at the hotel bar. Free parking is possible onsite. The hotel has a 24-hour reception. ***All new and existing Travco bookings will benefit from a 20 USD daily drinks credit per room, (not cumulative and for assigned bars only) and a 25 USD casino credit, (per room, per stay).***
